comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: When are you going to learn to give a deaf ears to all claims on being Satoshi? more are still coming underway, they know themselves they aren't and cant proof the fact they are, the more we keep getting much concerns about their weirdness the more they grow wings, let anybody claim he's Satoshi it's a good name everyone would love to bear and be identified with, but we know how the real Satoshi can be claimed.

The problem is that if we create an "information black hole" then CSW will have undisputed control over the media (skies) and will be able to tell them basically anything. Most won't even attempt to challenge such ideas and will just rubber-stamp them on their publications.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: Faketoshi is at it again. I just checked the tweets and the reply (that included the link to satoshi's post here in bitcointalk) was hidden by the author.Ugh, the effort that he puts in is just a waste.

I just checked the tweets and the reply (that included the link to satoshi's post here in bitcointalk) was hidden by the author.Lol! The hunter has been hunted. comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: Aanuoluwatofunmi on October 25, 2022, 08:28:38 AMWhen are you going to learn to give a deaf ears to all claims on being Satoshi? more are still coming underway, People who are still focusing on finding out the identity of satoshi are losing the main focus. If satoshi wanted the attention he would have made himself known but rather he didn't, so it means satoshi wants the attention to be focused on bitcoin, his creation that he has out forward. Ignore people who are claiming to be him, and redirect your focus to buying, hodling and using bitcoins.

comments.author: hatshepsut93
comments.body: The problem with CSW is that some people just like to have "alternative" point of view, they like going against the mainstream just for the sake of it, it makes them feel smart and special. So they support CWS and his crusade against Bitcoin Core, similar to how people believe in conspiracy theories. No amount of evidence is going to convince them otherwise. All CWS has to do is to keep lying, doesn't matter if he's doing well or not.

comments.body: Lol,¬† love the way Josema came back to reply to faketoshi that the real Satoshi is the one who wrote that which he(faketoshi) claimed is wrong.Another clear prove that this man called Craig Wright is not Satoshi Nakamoto...By the way, I must say that it's actually a kind of fun when this guys come up to claim to be Satoshi for the sole purpose of taking the glory bitcoin has brought the to real Satoshi, like me, I believe alot more will in the future step out and claim to be him(Satoshi), fingers crossed for who the next faketoshi would be.

comments.author: panganib999
comments.body: Digging the internet for Satoshi's identity is gonna be a huge waste of time. The guy completely made it clear he doesn't want anything to do with bitcoin after creating it. If that's not enough reason for people to invest their curiosity to something else then I do not know anymore. There are other more important points of discussions out there that warrants our time, and in my honest and straightforward opinion. Satoshi Nakamoto's identity, no matter how interesting or inquisitive it may be for the many, is not gonna be one of those discussions.
